text: new paragraph sale of lakes region restrictions amend rsa by inserting after paragraph ii the following new paragraph if the sale of the lakes region facility includes the portion that includes the parcel identified as communication drive containing a state call center and lakes region mutual fire aid then american rescue plan act funds may be used to the extent possible and a portion of the proceeds of the sale may be used to relocate this facility to a new location relocation shall include purchase of land if necessary and the renovation or construction of a new facility
